titleStmt.title: A short, legal, medicinal, usefull, safe, easie prescription, to recover our kingdom, Church, nation from their present dangerous, distractive, destructive confusion, and worse than Bedlam madnesse; seriously recommended to all English freemen who desire peace, safety, liberty, settlement. By William Prynne, Esq; a bencher of Lincolns Inne.
titleStmt.author: Prynne, William, 1600-1669.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed, and are to be sold by Edward Thomas at the Adam and Eve in Little Britain,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
